name: Dino Egg Roll
description:
A 3D puzzle platformer where you explore prehistoric locations rolling as a dino egg. It comes with obstacle courses , a cute low poly art style and puzzle challenges added in to tease your brain. Our game aims to be a fun and challenging experience for youngsters. It also has the added learning experience as our little dino encounters many different organisms of the prehistoric age along his journey which are collected as knowledge points

Objective:

The player must control the dino egg, complete tasks, reach designated locations and eventually reach the mother dinosaur without breaking the egg.

Target Audience:

10-18 years

Egg rolling Movement based on physics

Theme :

Jurassic era

Made By : Mily Manohar, Sangeeth GS
